metadata.name: 百花繚乱~Byakka Ryou RaN~
metadata.description:
The Japanese term "Byakka Ryou Lan" (a hundred flowers in bloom) is made up of 4
Japanese kanji.

This word has the meaning of many outstanding achievements and personalities.
As the beginning of many Japanese NFT creators being active in the world, we hope that people who express Japanese traditions and subcultures through NFT works and people who love them will bloom and meet at once, just as the cherry blossoms in Japan are in full bloom.
NFT, also represented in Japan, wrote Kunoichi (female Ninja) of "Amber", the twin sister of Sakuya of "Crypto Ninja". Ever since I was born, I have always wished for Japanese women to be active in the world, and I included this prayer!
Crypto Ninja" -> https://onl.la/Fc2GnbA
ーーーーー
「百花繚乱」＝種々の花が咲き乱れること
優れた業績や人物が沢山現れる事

これからの日本人NFTクリエイターが沢山世界で活躍する祈りを込め、又日本の伝統やサブカルチャーをNFT作品を通して表現する人、それを愛する人が一気に咲き乱れて出会うことを願い、桜が咲く時期に日本で代表的なNFTの「Crypto Ninja」の咲耶の双子の姉妹「琥珀」のくの一を書きました
願わくば日本人女性が世界に羽ばたきますよう、これは作者が生まれてからずっと持っている夢です
